packageRepo.readme:
# ğŸ™ğŸšğŸ› Double stroke numbers [Espanso](https://espanso.org) package to easy write Double stroke numbers. â­ï¸ Consider to star this package on [GitHub](https://github.com/kopach/espanso-package-double-stroke-numbers/stargazers) â€” it helps! [âœ¨ ğŸ‘‰ Check out my other espanso packages ğŸ‘ˆ âœ¨](https://github.com/kopach?tab=repositories&q=espanso-package&type=source)

![demo](https://github.com/kopach/espanso-package-double-stroke-numbers/raw/main/assets/demo.gif)

## Triggers | Keyword | Replaced | | ------- | -------- | | `;//0` | `ğŸ˜` | | `;//1'` | `ğŸ™` | | `;//2'` | `ğŸš` | | `;//3'` | `ğŸ›` | | `;//4'` | `ğŸœ` | | `;//5'` | `ğŸ` | | `;//6'` | `ğŸ` | | `;//7'` | `ğŸŸ` | | `;//8'` | `ğŸ ` | | `;//9'` | `ğŸ¡` | ## Contribute Please, feel free to contribute to this package on [GitHub](https://github.com/kopach/espanso-package-double-stroke-numbers) ## ğŸ“„ License This espanso package licensed under the [MIT](https://github.com/kopach/espanso-package-double-stroke-numbers/blob/master/LICENSE)

packageYml.name: package.yml
packageYml.content:
matches:
  # {{{ Double Stroke Numbers
  # https://www.webnots.com/alt-code-shortcuts-for-double-stroke-letters-and-numbers/
  - trigger: ';//0'
    replace: 'ğŸ˜'
  - trigger: ';//1'
    replace: 'ğŸ™'
  - trigger: ';//2'
    replace: 'ğŸš'
  - trigger: ';//3'
    replace: 'ğŸ›'
  - trigger: ';//4'
    replace: 'ğŸœ'
  - trigger: ';//5'
    replace: 'ğŸ'
  - trigger: ';//6'
    replace: 'ğŸ'
  - trigger: ';//7'
    replace: 'ğŸŸ'
  - trigger: ';//8'
    replace: 'ğŸ '
  - trigger: ';//9'
    replace: 'ğŸ¡'
  # }}}
